metadata.description:
A band of mutants slog through the harsh deserts of a dystopian planet in search of the factory – the last semblance of civilization left among the wasteland.

Dystopian science fiction from Alejandro Jodorowsky and Moebius collaborator – Yacine 'Elgo' Elghorri, character designer on Matt Groening's Futurama TV series.
metadata.name: Factory
